decision_log.details: Created from cross-repo analysis of ai-eng-dashboard security-related commits
spec.md created with 5 atomic specs, 30 ACs, 27 tasks

Applied 8 fixes from enforcement and investigation: split AS-004 into AS-004+AS-006, moved AC1.6 to AS-002 as AC2.7, updated AS-001 GitHub error mapper coverage, added AC3.9 to AS-003, resolved buildChildEnv location, clarified AS-005 limiter scope, noted AS-004 defense-in-depth context. Total: 6 atomic specs, 36 ACs, 29 tasks.

All 6 atomic specs implemented: AS-001 (error masking, 13 handlers + request.handler.ts), AS-002 (payload size guard, webhook middleware + express.json limit + rate limit capacity bounds), AS-003 (child env allowlist, 4 callsites updated), AS-004 (route param validation, 10 routes), AS-005 (concurrency limiter, bundle-argon-2 wrapped), AS-006 (Zod audit, all POST/PUT/PATCH already validated).
